function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate response to the comfort category in some standards, particularly leed and well.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate response to pandemic-resilient indicators in existing green building certification systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in approach to residential buildings among green building certification systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reviewed green building certification systems not ready for pandemic-tailored wastewater management","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of recommendation for touchless technologies to prevent virus spread","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Importance of balconies for socialization during isolation periods not addressed","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of pandemic-resilient indicators in environmental resources consumption","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address environmental resources indicators in well and leed standards","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in residential buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inflexible building design and layout","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective noise and vibration control measures","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coverage of water quality and availability and wastewater management indicators by casbee","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete coverage of waste management indicators by casbee","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of water consumption indicators by casbee","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of safety measures in shared spaces and facilities for occupants could lead to increased risk of contagious diseases spreading.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of air pollutants within and outside the building could lead to poor indoor air quality and potential health risks for occupants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coverage for water quality and wastewater management indicators may result in potential risks to public health and environmental contamination.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of thermal comfort in virus propagation prevention","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multiple types of buildings covered, including hospitals and homes, could pose increased risk of contagion spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex scoring system with multiple criteria and sub-criteria could lead to oversight of key environmental factors related to disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of wastewater management in the standard","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate water quality testing and treatment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of pandemic-resilient indicators in the standard","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for mental health in the built environment","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air quality standards and monitoring","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear guidance on virus propagation prevention measures in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete addressing of pvp2 in the well criteria","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The focus on health and wellness in buildings may not adequately address contagious disease propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The pandemic-related \\'health and safety\\' rating system does not directly address contagious diseases in residential buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High energy consumption and inefficiency","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of water quality management strategy for building water systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective air filtering may result in increased particulate matter in the air supply, potentially worsening indoor air quality.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Susceptibility of indoor air to environmental tobacco smoke may lead to exposure of occupants to harmful chemicals and increased health risks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and airflow control may lead to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific credits in leed for mental health category","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"No matching credits in leed for specific categories pvp2 and pvp5","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Leed not primarily targeting design innovations for stopping virus propagation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Efficiency in cleaning coronavirus not thoroughly addressed in leed pilot credit","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air quality and voc reduction not fully addressing virus propagation risks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of waste management strategies in breeam guidance","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unaddressed personal comfort requirements in breeam guidance","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on backup energy sources","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specificity in water-saving strategies","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguous pollution prevention descriptions in sustainable buildings criterion","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of air direction, movement, and speed in microclimate criteria","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to natural environment","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of inclusive and accessible facilities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific criteria addressing virus propagation in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on environmental impact over public health in materials choice criteria","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of indoor environmental factors in relation to public health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
